DD_AGENT_HOST.description: Hostname or IP address of the Datadog Agent that this library sends trace data to.

DD_AI_GUARD_ENABLED.description: Enables AI Guard so the library can make AI Guard API calls; disabling it skips those calls without removing the library.

DD_AI_GUARD_ENDPOINT.description: URL of the AI Guard API endpoint that this library will send requests to.

DD_AI_GUARD_MAX_CONTENT_SIZE.description: Maximum size of content captured for AI Guard; content beyond this limit is truncated before being stored in span context.

DD_AI_GUARD_MAX_MESSAGES_LENGTH.description: Maximum number of messages captured for AI Guard; older messages are omitted when the limit is reached.

DD_AI_GUARD_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for requests sent to the AI Guard API.

DD_API_KEY.description: Datadog API key used to authenticate requests made without the Agent, such as agentless telemetry and AI Guard API calls.

DD_API_SECURITY_ENABLED.description: Enables AppSec API Security features, including API security checks and endpoint data collection.

DD_API_SECURITY_ENDPOINT_COLLECTION_ENAB.description: Enables reporting of application routes at application startup via telemetry.

DD_API_SECURITY_REQUEST_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate used to decide whether to perform API Security checks for a request.

DD_API_SECURITY_SAMPLE_DELAY.description: Minimum delay between API Security samples for the same endpoint, used to limit how often requests are selected for API Security checks.

DD_APM_TRACING_ENABLED.description: Enables or disables sending APM trace data. When disabled, tracing still runs to support other products, but only periodic heartbeat traces and manually kept traces are sent.

DD_APPSEC_AUTOMATED_USER_EVENTS_TRACKING.description: Controls automated user events tracking for AppSec, including enabling/disabling it and selecting a tracking mode. Deprecated; prefer the appsec.auto_user_instrumentation.mode setting.

DD_APPSEC_AUTO_USER_INSTRUMENTATION_MODE.description: Selects the AppSec automatic user instrumentation mode, which controls how user events are collected.

DD_APPSEC_ENABLED.description: Enables Datadog Application Security (AppSec) so the library performs security checks and loads AppSec instrumentation.

DD_APPSEC_HTTP_BLOCKED_TEMPLATE_HTML.description: Path to an HTML template file used as the response body when AppSec blocks a request.

DD_APPSEC_HTTP_BLOCKED_TEMPLATE_JSON.description: Path to a JSON template file used as the response body when AppSec blocks a request.

DD_APPSEC_HTTP_BLOCKED_TEMPLATE_TEXT.description: Path to a plain-text template file used as the response body when AppSec blocks a request.

DD_APPSEC_MAX_STACK_TRACES.description: Maximum number of stack traces AppSec collects per request; set to 0 to collect all.

DD_APPSEC_MAX_STACK_TRACE_DEPTH.description: Maximum number of stack-trace frames AppSec keeps when recording stack traces; set to 0 to keep all frames.

DD_APPSEC_MAX_STACK_TRACE_DEPTH_TOP_PERC.description: When limiting AppSec stack trace depth, percentage of the kept frames taken from the top of the stack.

DD_APPSEC_OBFUSCATION_PARAMETER_KEY_REGE.description: Regular expression used to decide which request parameter names are obfuscated by AppSec.

DD_APPSEC_OBFUSCATION_PARAMETER_VALUE_RE.description: Regular expression used to decide which request parameter values are obfuscated by AppSec.

DD_APPSEC_RASP_ENABLED.description: Enables AppSec Runtime Application Self-Protection (RASP) features that detect malicious inputs and help prevent harmful side-effects.

DD_APPSEC_RULES.description: Selects the Application Security ruleset (built-in or custom file) used by the AppSec security engine.

DD_APPSEC_SCA_ENABLED.description: Enables or disables AppSec Software Composition Analysis (SCA).

DD_APPSEC_STACK_TRACE_ENABLED.description: Enables collection of stack traces for AppSec security events.

DD_APPSEC_TRACE_RATE_LIMIT.description: Rate limit for AppSec traces kept due to security events.

DD_APPSEC_WAF_DEBUG.description: Enables debug logging for the AppSec Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DD_APPSEC_WAF_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for AppSec Web Application Firewall (WAF) operations, such as RASP checks.

DD_APP_KEY.description: Datadog application key used to authenticate requests to the AI Guard API.

DD_CRASHTRACKING_ENABLED.description: Enables crash tracking, reporting information when the Ruby VM crashes.

DD_DATA_STREAMS_ENABLED.description: Enables Data Streams Monitoring, which collects and reports data lineage information for messaging systems.

DD_DBM_PROPAGATION_MODE.description: Controls SQL comment propagation for Database Monitoring to correlate database queries with traces. When enabled, additional metadata may be stored in query comments and persisted in the database.

DD_DISABLE_DATADOG_RAILS.description: Disables the Datadog Rails integration auto-instrumentation.

DD_DYNAMIC_INSTRUMENTATION_ENABLED.description: Enables Dynamic Instrumentation, allowing the library to apply and manage runtime probes for debugging and diagnostics.

DD_DYNAMIC_INSTRUMENTATION_PROBE_FILE.description: Path to a JSON file containing Dynamic Instrumentation probes to load.

DD_DYNAMIC_INSTRUMENTATION_REDACTED_IDEN.description: Comma-separated list of variable, attribute, or hash key names to redact from Dynamic Instrumentation snapshots.

DD_DYNAMIC_INSTRUMENTATION_REDACTED_TYPE.description: Comma-separated list of class name patterns whose values should be redacted from Dynamic Instrumentation snapshots.

DD_ENV.description: Your application environment (for example, production or staging), sent as the env tag on traces.

DD_ERROR_TRACKING_HANDLED_ERRORS.description: Controls whether Error Tracking reports handled errors from user code, third-party gems, or both.

DD_ERROR_TRACKING_HANDLED_ERRORS_INCLUDE.description: Comma-separated list of paths, file names, or gem names whose handled errors should be reported by Error Tracking.

DD_EXPERIMENTAL_FLAGGING_PROVIDER_ENABLE.description: Enables the Datadog OpenFeature feature flagging provider (experimental).

DD_EXPERIMENTAL_PROPAGATE_PROCESS_TAGS_E.description: Enables experimental propagation of process tags in payloads such as spans and telemetry.

DD_EXTERNAL_ENV.description: External data provided by the runtime to help Datadog identify the container/process for origin detection.

DD_GIT_COMMIT_SHA.description: Git commit SHA of the application source code.

DD_GIT_REPOSITORY_URL.description: Git repository URL of the application source code.

DD_INJECTION_ENABLED.description: Indicates whether the library was loaded via Datadog single-step instrumentation (SSI) injection.

DD_INSTRUMENTATION_INSTALL_ID.description: Installation identifier used by Datadog library injection for telemetry.

DD_INSTRUMENTATION_INSTALL_TIME.description: Installation time recorded by Datadog library injection for telemetry.

DD_INSTRUMENTATION_INSTALL_TYPE.description: Installation type recorded by Datadog library injection for telemetry.

DD_INSTRUMENTATION_TELEMETRY_ENABLED.description: Enables sending instrumentation telemetry data to Datadog.

DD_LOGS_INJECTION.description: Enables log injection, adding trace correlation information to supported loggers.

DD_METRIC_AGENT_PORT.description: Port of the Datadog Agent StatsD endpoint that this library sends metrics to.

DD_PROFILING_ALLOCATION_ENABLED.description: Enables allocation profiling, collecting object allocation samples in profiles.

DD_PROFILING_DIR_INTERRUPTION_WORKAROUND.description: Enables a workaround for Ruby Dir interruption issues caused by profiling signals.

DD_PROFILING_ENDPOINT_COLLECTION_ENABLED.description: Controls whether endpoint names are collected and attached to profiles when profiling is used with tracing.

DD_PROFILING_EXPERIMENTAL_HEAP_ENABLED.description: Enables preview heap profiling, collecting heap profiles (requires allocation profiling).

DD_PROFILING_EXPERIMENTAL_HEAP_SAMPLE_RA.description: Sampling rate for preview heap profiling.

DD_PROFILING_EXPERIMENTAL_HEAP_SIZE_ENAB.description: Enables collection of heap size profiles for heap profiling.

DD_PROFILING_GC_ENABLED.description: Enables garbage collection profiling, collecting GC activity in profiles.

DD_PROFILING_GVL_ENABLED.description: Enables GVL profiling to report time threads spend waiting for the Global VM Lock.

DD_PROFILING_HEAP_CLEAN_AFTER_GC_ENABLED.description: Controls whether heap profiling performs cleanup after garbage collection.

DD_PROFILING_MAX_FRAMES.description: Maximum number of stack frames captured per thread sample in profiles.

DD_PROFILING_NATIVE_FILENAMES_ENABLED.description: Controls whether the profiler uses native filenames for stack frames from native code.

DD_PROFILING_NO_SIGNALS_WORKAROUND_ENABL.description: Enables a workaround mode that reduces reliance on profiling signals to avoid interrupt-related issues in some libraries.

DD_PROFILING_OVERHEAD_TARGET_PERCENTAGE.description: Target overhead percentage for profiling; the profiler adjusts sampling to stay near this target.

DD_PROFILING_PREVIEW_OTEL_CONTEXT_ENABLE.description: Controls whether the profiler attempts to read context from OpenTelemetry.

DD_PROFILING_SHUTDOWN_ON_EXEC_ENABLED.description: Stops profiling before an exec call to avoid profiling state leaking into the new process.

DD_PROFILING_SIGHANDLER_SAMPLING_ENABLED.description: Controls whether the profiler samples directly from the signal handler for improved accuracy.

DD_PROFILING_SKIP_MYSQL2_CHECK.description: Disables the profiler compatibility check of the libmysqlclient version used by mysql2.

DD_PROFILING_TIMELINE_ENABLED.description: Enables data collection for the profiler timeline feature.

DD_PROFILING_UPLOAD_PERIOD.description: Interval between profiler data uploads; cannot be lower than 60 seconds.

DD_PROFILING_UPLOAD_TIMEOUT.description: Network timeout for uploading profiling data to Datadog.

DD_REDIS_COMMAND_ARGS.description: When enabled, includes Redis command arguments in span resource names and tags; otherwise only the command name is shown.

DD_REMOTE_CONFIGURATION_ENABLED.description: Enables Remote Configuration, allowing configuration updates to be fetched and applied at runtime.

DD_REMOTE_CONFIG_BOOT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: Startup timeout for Remote Configuration; if exceeded, the application proceeds using local configuration.

DD_REMOTE_CONFIG_POLL_INTERVAL_SECONDS.description: Polling interval for Remote Configuration updates.

DD_RODA_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Roda integration.

DD_RODA_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Roda integration.

DD_RUNTIME_METRICS_RUNTIME_ID_ENABLED.description: When enabled, adds a runtime-id tag to runtime metrics to distinguish individual processes.

DD_SERVICE.description: Your application's default service name, set as the service tag on traces.

DD_SITE.description: Datadog site used to select the Datadog intake domain for agentless requests, such as telemetry and AI Guard API calls.

DD_SPAN_SAMPLING_RULES.description: Single Span Sampling rules that allow selected spans to be kept even when their enclosing traces are dropped.

DD_SPAN_SAMPLING_RULES_FILE.description: Path to a file containing Single Span Sampling rules.

DD_TAGS.description: Custom tags applied to traces and other Datadog data, provided as comma-separated key:value pairs.

DD_TELEMETRY_AGENTLESS_URL.description: Overrides the agentless telemetry intake URL (intended for internal testing).

DD_TELEMETRY_DEPENDENCY_COLLECTION_ENABL.description: Controls whether instrumentation telemetry reports the application's bundled Ruby gem dependencies.

DD_TELEMETRY_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL.description: Interval at which instrumentation telemetry is sent (primarily for internal testing).

DD_TELEMETRY_LOG_COLLECTION_ENABLED.description: Enables log collection for instrumentation telemetry.

DD_TELEMETRY_METRICS_AGGREGATION_INTERVA.description: Interval at which instrumentation telemetry metrics are aggregated before being sent (primarily for internal testing).

DD_TELEMETRY_METRICS_ENABLED.description: Enables collection and reporting of instrumentation telemetry metrics.

DD_TRACE_128_BIT_TRACEID_GENERATION_ENAB.description: Controls whether generated trace IDs are 128-bit instead of 64-bit.

DD_TRACE_128_BIT_TRACEID_LOGGING_ENABLED.description: Enables injecting 128-bit trace IDs for log correlation; currently not supported by the backend.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_CABLE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Action Cable integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_CABLE_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_R.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Action Cable integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_CABLE_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Action Cable integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_MAILER_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Action Mailer integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_MAILER_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Action Mailer integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_MAILER_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Action Mailer integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_PACK_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Action Pack integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_PACK_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RA.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Action Pack integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_PACK_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Action Pack integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_VIEW_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Action View integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_VIEW_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RA.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Action View integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTION_VIEW_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Action View integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_JOB_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Active Job integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_JOB_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RAT.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Active Job integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_JOB_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Active Job integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_MODEL_SERIALIZERS_ANALYT.description: Enables analytics for the Active Model Serializers integration.
Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Active Model Serializers integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_MODEL_SERIALIZERS_ENABLE.description: Enables tracing for the Active Model Serializers integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_RECORD_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Active Record integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_RECORD_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Active Record integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_RECORD_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Active Record integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_SUPPORT_ANALYTICS_ENABLE.description: Enables analytics for the Active Support integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_SUPPORT_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Active Support integration.

DD_TRACE_ACTIVE_SUPPORT_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Active Support integration.

DD_TRACE_AGENT_PORT.description: Port of the Datadog Agent trace intake where this library sends trace data.

DD_TRACE_AGENT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: Timeout (in seconds) for connecting to the Datadog Agent when sending trace data.

DD_TRACE_AGENT_URL.description: URL endpoint where this library sends trace data to the Datadog Agent; can use HTTP or a Unix domain socket.

DD_TRACE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables the legacy tracing analytics feature (deprecated).

DD_TRACE_AWS_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the AWS integration.

DD_TRACE_AWS_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the AWS integration.

DD_TRACE_AWS_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the AWS integration.

DD_TRACE_AWS_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the AWS integration.

DD_TRACE_AWS_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the AWS integration.

DD_TRACE_BAGGAGE_TAG_KEYS.description: Comma-separated list of baggage keys that should be converted into span tags (prefixed with baggage.).

DD_TRACE_CLIENT_IP_ENABLED.description: Enables collection of client IP addresses from HTTP requests and reporting them on traces.

DD_TRACE_CLIENT_IP_HEADER.description: Name of an optional custom HTTP header used to resolve the client IP address.

DD_TRACE_CONCURRENT_RUBY_ENABLED.description: Controls whether the Concurrent Ruby integration propagates tracing context.

DD_TRACE_DALLI_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Dalli (Memcached) integration.

DD_TRACE_DALLI_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Dalli (Memcached) integration.

DD_TRACE_DALLI_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Dalli (Memcached) integration.

DD_TRACE_DALLI_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Dalli (Memcached) integration.

DD_TRACE_DALLI_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Dalli (Memcached) integration.

DD_TRACE_DEBUG.description: Enables debug mode, producing verbose tracer logs (not recommended for production or sensitive environments).

DD_TRACE_DELAYED_JOB_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Delayed Job integration.

DD_TRACE_DELAYED_JOB_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RA.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Delayed Job integration.

DD_TRACE_DELAYED_JOB_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Delayed Job integration.

DD_TRACE_ELASTICSEARCH_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Elasticsearch integration.

DD_TRACE_ELASTICSEARCH_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Elasticsearch integration.

DD_TRACE_ELASTICSEARCH_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Elasticsearch integration.

DD_TRACE_ELASTICSEARCH_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Elasticsearch integration.

DD_TRACE_ELASTICSEARCH_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Elasticsearch integration.

DD_TRACE_ENABLED.description: Enables or disables tracing. When disabled, instrumentation still runs but no trace data is sent.

DD_TRACE_ETHON_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Ethon integration.

DD_TRACE_ETHON_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Ethon integration.

DD_TRACE_ETHON_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Ethon integration.

DD_TRACE_ETHON_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Ethon integration.

DD_TRACE_ETHON_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Ethon integration.

DD_TRACE_EXCON_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Excon integration.

DD_TRACE_EXCON_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Excon integration.

DD_TRACE_EXCON_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Excon integration.

DD_TRACE_EXCON_ERROR_STATUS_CODES.description: HTTP status codes that should be marked as errors for spans generated by the Excon integration.

DD_TRACE_EXCON_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Excon integration.

DD_TRACE_EXCON_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Excon integration.

DD_TRACE_EXPERIMENTAL_RUNTIME_ID_ENABLED.description: Enables adding a runtime-id tag to runtime metrics (experimental).

DD_TRACE_FARADAY_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Faraday integration.

DD_TRACE_FARADAY_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Faraday integration.

DD_TRACE_FARADAY_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Faraday integration.

DD_TRACE_FARADAY_ERROR_STATUS_CODES.description: HTTP status codes that should be marked as errors for spans generated by the Faraday integration.

DD_TRACE_FARADAY_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Faraday integration.

DD_TRACE_FARADAY_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Faraday integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Grape integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPE_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Grape integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPE_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Grape integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPE_ERROR_STATUS_CODES.description: HTTP status codes that should be marked as errors for spans generated by the Grape integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPHQL_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the GraphQL integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPHQL_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the GraphQL integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPHQL_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the GraphQL integration.

DD_TRACE_GRAPHQL_ERROR_EXTENSIONS.description: List of GraphQL error extension keys to include in the span event reported for GraphQL queries with errors.

DD_TRACE_GRAPHQL_ERROR_TRACKING.description: Surfaces GraphQL errors in Error Tracking.

DD_TRACE_GRAPHQL_WITH_UNIFIED_TRACER.description: Enables GraphQL instrumentation using the UnifiedTrace tracer (recommended for graphql >= 2.2) to support the Endpoints list.

DD_TRACE_GRPC_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the gRPC integration.

DD_TRACE_GRPC_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the gRPC integration.

DD_TRACE_GRPC_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the gRPC integration.

DD_TRACE_GRPC_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the gRPC integration.

DD_TRACE_GRPC_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the gRPC integration.

DD_TRACE_HANAMI_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Hanami integration.

DD_TRACE_HEADER_TAGS.description: List of HTTP headers to record as span tags, optionally mapping header names to custom tag names.

DD_TRACE_HTTPCLIENT_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the httpclient integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPCLIENT_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RAT.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the httpclient integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPCLIENT_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the httpclient integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPCLIENT_ERROR_STATUS_CODES.description: HTTP status codes that should be marked as errors for spans generated by the httpclient integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPCLIENT_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the httpclient integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPCLIENT_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the httpclient integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPRB_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the HTTP.rb integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPRB_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the HTTP.rb integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPRB_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the HTTP.rb integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPRB_ERROR_STATUS_CODES.description: HTTP status codes that should be marked as errors for spans generated by the HTTP.rb integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPRB_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the HTTP.rb integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTPRB_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the HTTP.rb integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTP_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the net/http integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTP_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the net/http integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTP_CLIENT_ERROR_STATUSES.description: HTTP status codes that should be treated as errors for http.client spans.

DD_TRACE_HTTP_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the net/http integration.

DD_TRACE_HTTP_ERROR_STATUS_CODES.description: HTTP status codes that should be marked as errors for spans generated by the net/http instrumentation.

DD_TRACE_HTTP_SERVER_ERROR_STATUSES.description: HTTP status codes that should be treated as errors for http.server spans.

DD_TRACE_KAFKA_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Kafka integration.

DD_TRACE_KAFKA_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Kafka integration.

DD_TRACE_KAFKA_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Kafka integration.

DD_TRACE_KARAFKA_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Karafka integration.

DD_TRACE_LOGRAGE_ENABLED.description: Enables injecting trace correlation fields into Lograge logs when log injection is enabled.

DD_TRACE_MEMCACHED_COMMAND_ENABLED.description: Controls whether Memcached commands are collected as span tags; command keys may contain sensitive information.

DD_TRACE_MONGO_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the MongoDB integration.

DD_TRACE_MONGO_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the MongoDB integration.

DD_TRACE_MONGO_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the MongoDB integration.

DD_TRACE_MONGO_JSON_COMMAND.description: Serializes the MongoDB command as JSON on spans to enable query introspection in the Datadog app.

DD_TRACE_MONGO_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the MongoDB integration.

DD_TRACE_MONGO_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the MongoDB integration.

DD_TRACE_MYSQL2_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the mysql2 integration.

DD_TRACE_MYSQL2_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the mysql2 integration.

DD_TRACE_MYSQL2_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the mysql2 integration.

DD_TRACE_MYSQL2_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the mysql2 integration.

DD_TRACE_MYSQL2_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the mysql2 integration.

DD_TRACE_NATIVE_SPAN_EVENTS.description: Forces the tracer to always send span events using the native span events format, which can be useful in agentless setups.

DD_TRACE_NET_HTTP_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the net/http integration.

DD_TRACE_NET_HTTP_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the net/http integration.

DD_TRACE_OPENSEARCH_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the OpenSearch integration.

DD_TRACE_OPENSEARCH_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RAT.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the OpenSearch integration.

DD_TRACE_OPENSEARCH_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the OpenSearch integration.

DD_TRACE_OPENSEARCH_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the OpenSearch integration.

DD_TRACE_OPENSEARCH_RESOURCE_PATTERN.description: Controls whether OpenSearch span resource names use the full or relative URL path.

DD_TRACE_OPENSEARCH_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the OpenSearch integration.

DD_TRACE_PEER_SERVICE_DEFAULTS_ENABLED.description: Enables automatic population of the peer.service tag for instrumented dependencies.

DD_TRACE_PEER_SERVICE_MAPPING.description: Remaps peer.service values across instrumentation using a list of old:new pairs.

DD_TRACE_PG_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the pg (Postgres) integration.

DD_TRACE_PG_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the pg (Postgres) integration.

DD_TRACE_PG_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the pg (Postgres) integration.

DD_TRACE_PG_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the pg (Postgres) integration.

DD_TRACE_PG_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the pg (Postgres) integration.

DD_TRACE_PRESTO_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Presto integration.

DD_TRACE_PRESTO_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Presto integration.

DD_TRACE_PRESTO_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Presto integration.

DD_TRACE_PRESTO_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Presto integration.

DD_TRACE_PRESTO_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Presto integration.

DD_TRACE_PROPAGATION_EXTRACT_FIRST.description: Stops context extraction after the first valid distributed tracing propagation format is found.

DD_TRACE_PROPAGATION_STYLE.description: Distributed tracing propagation formats to use for both extraction and injection.

DD_TRACE_PROPAGATION_STYLE_EXTRACT.description: Ordered list of distributed tracing propagation formats to extract from incoming requests.

DD_TRACE_PROPAGATION_STYLE_INJECT.description: List of distributed tracing propagation formats to inject into outgoing requests.

DD_TRACE_QUE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Que integration.

DD_TRACE_QUE_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Que integration.

DD_TRACE_QUE_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Que integration.

DD_TRACE_QUE_TAG_ARGS_ENABLED.description: Enables tagging a Que job's args field on spans.

DD_TRACE_QUE_TAG_DATA_ENABLED.description: Enables tagging a Que job's data field on spans.

DD_TRACE_RACECAR_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Racecar integration.

DD_TRACE_RACECAR_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Racecar integration.

DD_TRACE_RACECAR_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Racecar integration.

DD_TRACE_RAKE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Rake integration.

DD_TRACE_RAKE_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Rake integration.

DD_TRACE_RAKE_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Rake integration.

DD_TRACE_RATE_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of traces per second to sample.

DD_TRACE_REDIS_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Redis integration.

DD_TRACE_REDIS_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Redis integration.

DD_TRACE_REDIS_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Redis integration.

DD_TRACE_REDIS_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Redis integration.

DD_TRACE_REDIS_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Redis integration.

DD_TRACE_REMOVE_INTEGRATION_SERVICE_NAME.description: Uses the application service name for spans from all integrations, instead of integration-specific service names.

DD_TRACE_REPORT_HOSTNAME.description: Adds a hostname tag to traces.

DD_TRACE_RESOURCE_RENAMING_ALWAYS_SIMPLI.description: When enabled, always infer http.endpoint from the request path instead of using http.route.

DD_TRACE_RESOURCE_RENAMING_ENABLED.description: Enables resource renaming so the http.endpoint tag reflects the framework route or an inferred route.

DD_TRACE_RESQUE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Resque integration.

DD_TRACE_RESQUE_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Resque integration.

DD_TRACE_REST_CLIENT_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the RestClient integration.

DD_TRACE_REST_CLIENT_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the RestClient integration.

DD_TRACE_RODA_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the Roda integration.

DD_TRACE_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Default trace sampling rate, controlling the fraction of traces kept.

DD_TRACE_SAMPLING_RULES.description: Trace-level sampling rules (JSON) matched against the local root span.

DD_TRACE_SEMANTIC_LOGGER_ENABLED.description: Enables injecting trace correlation fields into Semantic Logger logs when log injection is enabled.

DD_TRACE_SEQUEL_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Sequel integration.

DD_TRACE_STARTUP_LOGS.description: Prints startup configuration and diagnostics to logs to help assess tracing at application startup.

DD_TRACE_STRIPE_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Stripe integration.

DD_TRACE_TEST_MODE_ENABLED.description: Enables tracer test mode, using test-oriented trace flushing and writer behavior.

DD_TRACE_TRILOGY_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description: Enables analytics for the Trilogy integration.

DD_TRACE_TRILOGY_ANALYTICS_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for analytics events generated by the Trilogy integration.

DD_TRACE_TRILOGY_PEER_SERVICE.description: Name of the external service for spans generated by the Trilogy integration.

DD_TRACE_TRILOGY_SERVICE_NAME.description: Service name used for spans generated by the Trilogy integration.

DD_TRACE_WATERDROP_ENABLED.description: Enables tracing for the WaterDrop integration.

DD_TRACE_X_DATADOG_TAGS_MAX_LENGTH.description: Maximum size allowed for the x-datadog-tags distributed trace tags header; larger values are not parsed or propagated.

DD_VERSION.description: Your application version, set as the version tag on traces.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT.description: Sets the endpoint URL used by the OpenTelemetry OTLP exporter.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_HEADERS.description: Sets additional headers sent by the OpenTelemetry OTLP exporter, as a comma-separated list of key=value pairs.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_ENDPOINT.description: Sets a custom endpoint URL for OpenTelemetry metrics export via OTLP.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_HEADERS.description: Sets additional headers sent with OpenTelemetry OTLP metrics export requests, as a comma-separated list of key=value pairs.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_PROTOCOL.description: Selects the protocol used for OpenTelemetry OTLP metrics export. Only http/protobuf is supported.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_TEMPORALITY_P.description: Selects the temporality preference for OpenTelemetry metrics export (delta or cumulative).

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_TIMEOUT.description: Sets the timeout, in milliseconds, for OpenTelemetry OTLP metrics export. If not explicitly set, the metrics exporter uses the general OTLP timeout setting per the OpenTelemetry specification.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_PROTOCOL.description: Selects the protocol used by the OpenTelemetry OTLP exporter. Only http/protobuf is supported.

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_TIMEOUT.description: Sets the timeout, in milliseconds, for OpenTelemetry OTLP export requests.

OTEL_LOG_LEVEL.description: Enables Datadog debug mode and verbose diagnostic logging when set to debug.

OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER.description: Selects the metrics exporter used by the library. Use none to disable metrics export.

OTEL_METRIC_EXPORT_INTERVAL.description: Sets the interval, in milliseconds, between OpenTelemetry metrics exports.

OTEL_METRIC_EXPORT_TIMEOUT.description: Sets the timeout, in milliseconds, for each OpenTelemetry metrics export cycle.

OTEL_PROPAGATORS.description: Configures which propagators are used for extracting and injecting trace context.

OTEL_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTES.description: Sets resource attributes/tags applied to Datadog products (e.g., traces, profiles) as key-value pairs (key=value or key:value) separated by commas or whitespace.

OTEL_SERVICE_NAME.description: Sets the service name reported by the library.

OTEL_TRACES_EXPORTER.description: Controls whether tracing is enabled; setting it to none disables tracing.

OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER.description: Selects the OpenTelemetry trace sampler (always_on, always_off, traceidratio, or parentbased variants), which is mapped to a sampling rate.

OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER_ARG.description: Provides the argument value used by the traceidratio OpenTelemetry sampler.
